resources.string: The application requires [Modify System Settings] permission to work

In order to allow the application to run in the background, it is recommended to disable the battery optimization. Click the \"OK\" button, and then find the application in the settings page and select \"Don\'t optimize\"

The app will continuously monitor the folding status of the foldable phone. If the phone is folded, the auto-rotation feature will be turned off, otherwise, the auto-rotation feature will be enabled.
This app requires the "Modify System Settings" permission to function properly. Additionally, you need to manually grant the app permissions for auto-start and unrestricted background operation, especially on devices from Chinese manufacturers.
This app does not require an internet connection, is open-source and free to use.
Open source project: https://github.com/DreamistW/Foldable-Rotation

This app requires the \"Modify System Setting\" permission to function properly. This permission is used only for toggling the auto-rotation feature and will not be used for any other purpose. Click the \"OK\" button to open the settings page and grant authorization.
